events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn’t updated in days.
The reported problem has been identified as a potential delivery delay based on the customer's description.
The case was assigned to Customer Support Agent Rachel to handle the delivery delay inquiry promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear about the delay with your order shipment.
Could you please provide your order number so I can check the current status with our shipping partner?
Sure, the order number is 987654321. I have been checking the tracking page, but it hasn’t updated since last week.
Thank you for the info. I contacted the courier, and your package is currently delayed due to weather issues. We expect delivery within three days.
Thanks for the update. I’m disappointed it’s delayed, but I appreciate your clarification on the timeline.
We will monitor your delivery and update you if anything changes. Please let us know if the package does not arrive within the next three days.
We wanted to follow up to confirm if your package has arrived safely. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
Since the delivery issue has been addressed and no further concerns were raised, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience.
